description: World's most advanced 7" tablet with stunning HD display, exclusive Dolby audio, and the fastest Wi-Fi found on a tablet. When it comes to HD displays, great resolution is just the start. Kindle Fire HD delivers rich color and deep contrast from every angle, with an advanced polarizing filter and anti-glare technology.  Audio is optimized based on what you're listening to, using the power of Dolby Digital Plus to adjust volume, create virtual surround sound, and deliver easier-to-understand dialogue in movies and TV shows.
title: Kindle Fire HD 7", Dolby Audio, Dual-Band Wi-Fi, 16 GB
